org.apache.river.qa.harness

Class SlaveTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.SlaveTest

  • public class SlaveTest
extends Object
    The slave side of a distributed test. This class provides the main method for in its own VM, provides static utility method for sending messages to a SlaveTest instance, and implement a message handler to receive and execute SlaveRequest messages.

    • Method Detail

      • call

        public static Object call(String name,
                          SlaveRequest request)
                   throws TestException
        Utility method to send a SlaveRequest message to a SlaveTest instance.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the slave host
        request - the request to send
        Returns:
        the object by the SlaveRequest.doSlaveRequest method
        Throws:
        TestException - if the call fails

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(SlaveRequest request)
        Utility method to 'broadcast' a SlaveRequest message to all participating SlaveTests. The request is sent to each participant in sequence. Failures are logged, but otherwise ignored.
        Parameters:
        request - the SlaveRequest to send

      • waitForSlaveDeath

        public static void waitForSlaveDeath(int timeout)
        Wait for all slaves to die. All participating slave are pinged once per second until timeout seconds elapse. When all pings throw Exception, the slaves are assumed to be dead and this method returns.
        Parameters:
        timeout - maximum time in seconds to way for slave death. If zero or negative, this method returns immediately

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        The main method for the slave test VM. The QAConfig object is read from System.in, and AdminManager is instantiated, class servers are started, and the request handling loop is entered (optionally in the context of a user login). The args passed to the main method are not used; the args supplied to the master test are available in QAConfig.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments (unused)

      • getConfig

        public QAConfig getConfig()
        Accessor for SlaveRequest to obtain the config object.
        Returns:
        the QAConfig object

      • getAdminManager

        public AdminManager getAdminManager()
        Accessor for SlaveRequest to obtain the admin manager.
        Returns:
        the AdminManager

      • getStorageMap

        public HashMap getStorageMap()
        Accessor for the storage map which allow the test to maintain state across slave calls.
        Returns:
        the storage map
